title: About
text: I am currently a Ph.D. students in the Department of Statistics at the University of Wisconsin, Madison.

title: About
text:
Previously
Before that I was a M.S. student and taught in the Department of Statistics at Wake Forest University. There I worked with Dr. Sarah Lotspeich on correcting for missing data for surrogate validation in a clinical setting. I was a baby mathematician (undergraduate student) at Smith College with a minor in Statistics and Data Science.
